settings.item_description:
Celebrating the love of the outdoors and it’s greenery has always been a passion of ours.
Hiking in our local forests trying to identify native foliage has sparked a curiosity.. How can we share the endless beauty of the outdoors with the world? So we created
Jade Plant Shop just for that!

Brightening up any space big or small adding comfort and personality to every setting. Frome event planing, gifting, or just a little gree for yourself. You'll find something you'll love at Jade plant shop.

settings.about_title: Planting that will be your best friends
settings.about_description: We are Jade Plant Shop, a small but motivated company specializing in creating playful environments that shine with color.

settings.testimonial_description: “Samsa was a travelling salesman and above it there hung a picture that he had recently cut out of an illustrated magazine and housed in a nice, gilded frame. It showed a lady fitted out with a fur hat and”
